definition: unrequited love/one-sided love
surname Shan
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: She didn't share his feelings towards her. That's unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 她对他没有像他对她一样的感情，这就是单恋了。

sentences.english: A quirky film about unrequited love.
sentences.chinese: 一部关于单恋的离奇影片。

sentences.english: I think Cecily is carrying a torch for Quentin.
sentences.chinese: 我想塞西莉正单恋着昆廷。

sentences.english: Both already have a love, or in the unrequited love, crush the people.
sentences.chinese: 无论是已经拥有了爱情，还是处于单恋，暗恋中的人。

sentences.english: I've been sweet on Jane for years.
Unrequited love is love that is not reciprocated, even though reciprocation is usually deeply desired.
sentences.chinese: 单恋是爱是没有得到回报，即使回报通常是深切期望。

sentences.english: So, how can one get over a one-sided relationship?
sentences.chinese: 那么，怎样才结束一种单恋关系？

sentences.english: The  most  special  feeling  of  human  is  the  blind  love. That's  the  unique.
sentences.chinese: 人类的感情最特别的就是单恋，那是绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: We are the cursed of the loved ones .
sentences.chinese: 我们这些陷入单恋的人呢？

sentences.english: On top of this, when facing the professor she secretly adores, she acts innocent to get his attention.
sentences.chinese: 不仅如此，面对单恋的教授，还会无辜撒娇。

sentences.english: Eg. The friends said that I am very silly, why can carryatorchfora flower.
sentences.chinese: 朋友都说我很傻，为什么要单恋一枝花。

sentences.english: The most special feeling of human is the blind love.
sentences.chinese: 人类的感情最特别的就是单恋，那是绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: Think a bit about the difference between a crush and a friend.
sentences.chinese: 不妨思考一下“单恋对象”与“朋友”的不同。

sentences.english: He's hopelessly in love with Pat.
sentences.chinese: 他毫无希望地单恋着帕特。

sentences.english: 5The most special feeling of human is the blind love. That's the unique.
sentences.chinese: 5人类的感情最特别的就是单恋，那是绝无仅有的。

sentences.english: Errol has been carrying a torch for Money for almost two years.
sentences.chinese: 埃罗尔对莫尼单恋已经将近两年了。

definition: to be secretly in love with
one-sided lovesickness/unrequited longing
first love
to announce publicly/to explain oneself/to reveal one's feelings/to confess/to declare one's love
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to imagine that one's love is reciprocated/to shower affection on an uninterested party
sadomasochism
to lose one's love/to break up (in a romantic relationship)/to feel jilted
fickle in love/sentimentality
romance/love (romantic)/CL:個|个[ge4],份[fen4]
to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
pure and innocent/a pure heart
infatuation
